backend/main.mo: Defines the main actor with types for users, avatars, tasks, history entries, and comparison helpers, integrating blob storage and authorization mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries describing frontend files, components, and test IDs involved in overtime-related registration updates.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for many frontend files covering routing, dashboards, overtime features, components, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS variables for light and dark themes using OKLCH color values and applies global background, text, and border styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app and containing a rebuild trigger comment.
frontend/public/rebuild-trigger.txt: Timestamped file used to force frontend rebuilds with an incrementing build version.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app logic handling authentication, profile setup, role‑based routing, and profile refetching with an error boundary wrapper.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: React error boundary component that catches rendering errors and shows a reload prompt.
frontend/src/components/AssistantDetailV: Displays detailed assistant information including overtime totals, history, charts, task habits, export to CSV, and manager‑only actions.
frontend/src/components/AssistantList.ts: Renders a scrollable list of assistants with avatars and overtime totals, showing skeletons while loading and allowing selection of an assistant.
frontend/src/components/DangerZone.tsx: Provides UI for wiping all stored data, including confirmation dialog logic and mutation handling with cache clearing and logout.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Displays the app header with theme toggle, profile controls, avatar modal, and logout handling tied to Internet Identity and query cache.
frontend/src/components/ManagerAnalytics: Fetches overtime totals for assistants and displays summaries, progress bars, and a bar chart with loading states.
frontend/src/components/OvertimeChart.ts: Builds a cumulative overtime chart (line or bar) from entries, showing loading skeletons and empty states as needed.
frontend/src/components/OvertimeForm.tsx: Form for adding or using overtime with validation, submission handling, and UI for date, minutes, and optional comments.
Displays paginated, searchable overtime entries with editing allowed only for the latest entry.
Shows a summary card of total overtime days, hours, and minutes with loading skeletons.
frontend/src/components/profile/AvatarMo: Modal for uploading a profile picture or selecting a preset avatar, with validation and save actions.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileA: Renders a user avatar from a profile picture, preset image, or initials fallback.
frontend/src/components/ProfileDialog.ts: Profile modal allowing users to view profile data and edit their initials.
frontend/src/components/todo/AuditLogVie: Displays a searchable and filterable audit log of task actions with error handling.
frontend/src/components/todo/EvidenceIma: Dialog for viewing an enlarged evidence image associated with a task.
frontend/src/components/todo/MarkTaskDon: Dialog for submitting a task completion with optional comment and photo, handling file conversion and form reset.
frontend/src/components/todo/TaskComplet: Displays the user who completed a task, loading their profile and showing an avatar if available.
Component for selecting, capturing, previewing, and validating a task completion photo using file input or camera.
frontend/src/components/todo/TaskLedgerD: Dialog showing a task’s audit history with timestamps, actions, user info, and optional evidence photo previews.
frontend/src/components/todo/TaskPrefere: UI for selecting an assistant and viewing or updating their preference settings for all tasks.
frontend/src/components/todo/ToDoSection: Main task management section handling task CRUD, marking tasks done with photos, searching, and periodic refresh.
frontend/src/components/todo/ToDoTable.t: Renders an interactive task table with frequency coloring, photo previews, history dialogs, and actions like edit, complete, and pin.
frontend/src/components/todo/ToDoTaskDia: Provides a modal form for creating or editing tasks, including validation, frequency selection, and optional delete confirmation.
frontend/src/constants/dentalPresets.ts: Defines 24 static dental‑themed avatar presets and a helper to fetch a preset by ID.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the current Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider and hook managing authentication state, login, logout, and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, avatars, tasks, and related backend data using the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Manages light/dark/system theme preference with persistence and automatic system theme syncing.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive light/dark theme CSS variables for colors, layout, and UI elements.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, setting up React Query and Internet Identity provider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AssistantDashboard.ts: Renders assistant dashboard with tabs for to‑do tasks and overtime logging, summary, charts, and history.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Displays login screen using Internet Identity with branding, card UI, and loading state.
frontend/src/pages/ManagerDashboard.tsx: Provides manager dashboard with tabs for tasks, team management, analytics, audit logs, and settings.
frontend/src/pages/ProfileSetupPage.tsx: Contains profile setup form for username, initials, language, and initial overtime with validation and submission.
frontend/src/utils/externalBlobUrl.ts: Resolves an ExternalBlob to a usable URL, preferring direct URLs and falling back to object URLs.
frontend/src/utils/overtimeDates.ts: Utility functions for formatting overtime dates, getting today's local date, and detecting future dates.
frontend/src/utils/overtimeStyles.ts: Returns CSS classes for overtime cells based on whether overtime is added or used.
frontend/src/utils/photoValidation.ts: Validates image uploads, enforcing JPEG/PNG type and a 6MB size limit.
frontend/src/utils/presetTileColors.ts: Provides deterministic accent color sets for avatar tiles based on preset ID using a predefined OKLCH palette.
frontend/src/utils/taskHabits.ts: Calculates on‑time task metrics, formats completion history, and maps task preferences to labels and colors.
frontend/src/utils/todoDates.ts: Computes next due dates and urgency scores for tasks based on frequency and provides related date formatting utilities.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage support and hash‑routing compatibility.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, radii, shadows, animations, and enabling plugins for UI styling.
project_state.json: JSON file describing the project’s state, existing features, and pending requests related to a manager‑access rule.
